survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of fitness apps to understand their satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a fitness app?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple frequency scale. Ensure options cover all possible usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use a fitness app?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most in your fitness app? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted features.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most in your fitness app? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use a fitness app?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use a fitness app?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current fitness app?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current fitness app?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your fitness app?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Neutral', 'Dissatisfied', or 'Very dissatisfied' to Q4
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your fitness app?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Neutral', 'Dissatisfied', or 'Very dissatisfied' to Q4

questions.question_text: Have you paid for premium features in a fitness app?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge willingness to pay for premium features.

script.question_text: Have you paid for premium features in a fitness app?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: How much would you be willing to pay for a premium fitness app per month?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Yes' to Q6 or 'No' to Q6
questions.client_notes: Use a range of price points to assess willingness to pay.

script.question_text: How much would you be willing to pay for a premium fitness app per month?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Yes' to Q6 or 'No' to Q6

questions.question_text: What devices do you primarily use to access your fitness app? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted devices.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What devices do you primarily use to access your fitness app? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your fitness app to a friend or colleague?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for recommendation likelihood.
